api_list.api_description: Retrieve information from the FBI Wanted list.

optional_parameters.name: field_offices
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by specific FBI field offices.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of resources to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: List all countries available in the World Bank API.

optional_parameters.name: format_type
optional_parameters.description: The format in which to receive the data.

query: Can you show me a list of all countries available in the World Bank database and also check if there are any wanted individuals in the FBI's records?
